description: Chrome extension with FastAPI backend for real-time text translation

requirements.description: HUD state (position, size, theme, minimized) should be persisted using chrome.storage.local
acceptance_criteria: HUD position (top, left) is saved when moved
HUD size (width, height) is saved when resized
Theme preference is saved when changed
Minimized state is saved when toggled
All state is restored on page reload

requirements.description: Users should be able to reposition the HUD anywhere on the page
acceptance_criteria: Clicking and dragging the header moves the HUD
HUD is clamped to stay at least partially visible
Position is saved on drag release
Drag operation is smooth with no jitter

requirements.description: Users should be able to resize the HUD to suit their needs
acceptance_criteria: Resize handles visible on all 4 edges and corners
Dragging edges changes size in appropriate direction
Minimum size enforced (width: 260px, height: 120px)
Size is saved on resize complete
Cursor changes appropriately

requirements.description: Users should be able to collapse or dismiss the HUD temporarily
acceptance_criteria: Minimize button hides body content, leaves header visible
Clicking header restores full size
Close button hides entire HUD
Minimized state is persisted
Re-triggering translation shows HUD at last saved position

requirements.description: Users should be able to switch between color themes
acceptance_criteria: Theme icon (palette SVG) is available
Clicking cycles through themes: light → dark → blue
Each theme applies consistent colors
Theme choice persists across page reloads
Light: light background, dark text
Dark: dark background, light text
Blue: blue accent colors

requirements.description: The HUD should be accessible to users with assistive technology
acceptance_criteria: All buttons have aria-label attributes
Buttons are keyboard focusable (Tab key)
Enter/Space keys trigger button actions
Proper semantic HTML with button elements
